titles.title: From The Rising Of The Sun #2

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}From the rising of the sun To the going down of the same, Let the name of the Lord Be lifted up in praise. From the rising of the sun To the going down of the same, Let the name of the Lord be praised.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}The Lord is high above all nations And His glory above the heavens. Who is like unto the Lord, our God, Who reigns on high?{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
